author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Star Asia Investment to issue 2,683 units to Nomura Securities
text:
Feb 23 (Reuters) - Star Asia Investment Corp
* Says it confirmed that it will issue 2,683 units with the paid-in price of 103,002 yen per share, or for 276.4 million yen in total, through private placement to Nomura Securities Co., Ltd.,
* Says subscription date on Feb. 26 and payment date on Feb. 27
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/c4yzWN
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
